attributes.action: MPs who did not represent their constituents views at the referendum must resign
attributes.additional_details: Many MPs are openly discussing ignoring the referendum result. This act alone supports the need for change. This behaviour could also spark public disorder. Selecting new candidates would help legitimise a future government.
attributes.background: It is clear that the vast majority of MPs from all parties are self serving and do not listen to the people they should represent. As a result the British people deserve new representation. All parties should select new candidates who are willing to represent their constituency with honour.
